info.description:
This API allows modification of Security for specific applications.

The base endpoint URL for this API in production is: `https://marko.aramark.net/v1/security`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
